thread.title: Hong Kong Stocks Seen up as Asia Rallies, China Loan Data Due
thread.title_full: Hong Kong Stocks Seen up as Asia Rallies, China Loan Data Due - WSJ

author: Gregor Hunter
title: Hong Kong Stocks Seen up as Asia Rallies, China Loan Data Due
text: [Dow Jones] Hong Kong equities are poised for a rebound amid gains for regional benchmarks, which in early trading are shrugging off negative leads from U.S. markets as evidence mounts of discord among the Federal Reserve over the timing of its first rate hike. Markets are awaiting the release of data on Chinese money supply and bank lending growth, which Societe Generale says it expects “remained resilient in September, underpinned by public sector demand.” The Hang Seng Index fell 0.7% to 22,439.91 on Wednesday, its second day of losses, while H-share exchange-traded funds listed in the U.S. rebounded despite...
